metadata.title: CVE-2020-14392 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An untrusted pointer dereference flaw was found in Perl-DBI < 1.643. Alocal attacker who is able to manipulate calls to dbd_db_login6_sv() couldcause memory corruption, affecting the service's availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14392` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbi-perl - 1.640-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.640-1ubuntu0.1').
